9#ifndef DHCP_SNOOP_H
10#define DHCP_SNOOP_H
11
12#ifdef CONFIG_PROXYARP
13
14int dhcp_snoop_init(struct hostapd_data *hapd);
15void dhcp_snoop_deinit(struct hostapd_data *hapd);
16
17#else /* CONFIG_PROXYARP */
18
19static inline int dhcp_snoop_init(struct hostapd_data *hapd)
20{
21 return 0;
22}
23
24static inline void dhcp_snoop_deinit(struct hostapd_data *hapd)
25{
26}
27
28#endif /* CONFIG_PROXYARP */
29
30#endif /* DHCP_SNOOP_H */
